Name: Sky Ball
About the game: In this game you will visit the heavenly islands. Manage the ball get to the final point without falling, while you decide to solve all kinds of puzzles. The game has 3 types of balls, each of which has unique properties: Wooden - medium characteristics, Metallic - heavy and slow, Fur - light and fast. Each of them is useful to you in a certain difficult situation. Features: - Simple operation; - Relaxation music; - Beautiful, 3D environment;
